text:
e="preserve">Abdul Aziz bin Shamsuddin (10 June 1938 – 16 October 2020) was a Malaysian politician. He was Minister of Rural and Regional Development from 27 March 2004 to 18 March 2008. Between 2004 to 2008, he was a member of the Parliament of Malaysia. Shamsuddin was born in Gopeng, Malaysia.
Shamsuddin died on 16 October 2020 in Kuala Lumpur at the age of 82.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Rural and Regional Development
